ing: 2 pounds lean beef chuck, trimmed and cut into 1 inch cubes
des: "For all of you bachelors out there, this is a really great recipe and you can use it to catch a lady's eye! It is very savory and hearty!"
ins: Combine bread crumbs with salt and pepper and toss with beef.  Place coated beef cubes into a slow cooker and add onion, carrots, celery, basil, tapioca, mushrooms, soy sauce, tomato soup and broth.  Stir well, cover and cook on low for 10 to 12 hours, or on high for 3 to 5 hours.
